document.full_text: the surprise closure of another japanese nuclear plant, this time at the power supplier to the heart of the auto industry, threatens to dampen consumer sentiment and will provide car makers with yet another reason to produce fewer cars in japan.
document.title: japan nuclear plant shutdown adds new risk to economy
lines_and_colors: the surprise closure of another japanese nuclear plant, this time at the power supplier to the heart of the auto industry, threatens to dampen consumer sentiment and will provide car makers with yet another reason to produce fewer cars in japan.
